headline: UBS Stays Bullish on Edison (EIX) with $68 Target Despite Regulatory Uncertainty
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) is one of the most oversold S&P 500 stocks so far in 2025. On July 8, UBS analyst Gregg Orrill reiterated his Buy rating on Edison International, keeping the price target steady at $68. His near-term caution stems from the delayed outcome of the California general rate case (GRC), which he sees as […]
